PageTitle: bfd enable (MPLS TE P2P template view)
FuncDef:
The bfd enable command enables BFD for CR-LSP.
The undo bfd enable command disables BFD for CR-LSP.
By default, BFD for CR-LSP is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To rapidly detect LSP faults and improve network reliability, configuring BFD for CR-LSP is recommended. To enable BFD for CR-LSP, run the bfd enable command in the P2P TE tunnel template view.
Prerequisites
The BFD capability must be enabled globally.
